item.title: Fixed
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

case 411: if (c.playerLevel[5] > 98) { if (c.altarPrayed == 0) { c.altarPrayed = 1; c.setSidebarInterface(5, 22500); c.sendMessage("You sense a surge of power flow through your body!"); c.getCombat().resetPrayers(); } else if (c.altarPrayed == 1) { c.altarPrayed = 0; c.setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); c.sendMessage("You sense a surge of purity flow through your body!"); c.getCurse().resetCurse(); } c.startAnimation(645); } else { c.sendMessage("You need a Prayer level of 99 to switch prayers."); return; } break;

Read full topic

case 411: if(c.playerLevel[5] < 99) { c.sendMessage("You need a prayer level of 99 to switch prayers."); break; } if (c.altarPrayed == 0) { c.altarPrayed = 1; c.setSidebarInterface(5, 22500); c.startAnimation(645); c.sendMessage("You sense a surge of power flow through your body!"); c.getCombat().resetPrayers(); } else if (c.altarPrayed == 1) { c.altarPrayed = 0; c.setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); c.startAnimation(645); c.sendMessage("You sense a surge of purity flow through your body!"); c.getCurse().resetCurse(); } break;
